stories.text:
I am thinking of starting a service that connects interviewee with interviewers. While there are a few services that enable interviewees to schedule a mock interview to help prepare for their interview but almost none of these services seem to enable interviewee to select a particular interviewer based on their experience, expertise and background.

Professionals working in the field can signup to become an interviewer and set their own price as well.

Would this kinda service be useful to you as an interviewee or interviewer?
